alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:37AM CDT until April 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, Jackson and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 11.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
